actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to increase and extend the authorization for appropriations for the Council on Environmental Quality, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes to be appropriated to the Office of Environmental QUality an additional $1,000,000 for fiscal year 1973 and an additional $1,500,000 for fiscal years 1974-1976. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 4374)

titles.title: A bill to increase and extend the authorization for appropriations for the Council on Environmental Quality, and for other purposes.
